articles.title: SBI gives 30-40 bps concessions on home loan rates, offer valid till Mar-end | Mint - Mint
articles.description: SBI is offering as low as 8.60% interest rate on regular home loans to customers under the new offer. However, it needs to be noted that SBI's home loan rates vary depending upon credit scores.
